intro: Beilschmiedia telupidensis, commonly known as the Kauai beilschmiedia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Lauraceae. It is native to the Hawaiian island of Kauai and is characterized by its evergreen foliage and smooth, dark bark. The plant typically grows as a small tree or shrub, reaching heights of up to 10 meters. Its leaves are elliptical,革质 (leathery), and have a distinct aromatic scent. Beilschmiedia telupidensis plays an important ecological role in its native habitat, providing food and shelter for various native species.
